website_summaries.verdict: A small ball of fun that encourages your baby to respond to colors and sound.
pros: Made to withstand infants and very young babies who like to chew on their toys as much as they play with them
Can help your child recognize color, sound – and have fun doing so, as this toy rattles and shakes
cons: Not the softest toy for babies, but is a favorite of parents who appreciate its ability to improve hand-eye coordination

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice rattler for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice rattler for the price.My son loves to shake it but once his tongue got trapped between the small circle near the smiley.Won’t recommend seeing it’s danger.
customer_reviews.author: alka anand

customer_reviews.title: Refreshingly simple but engaging
customer_reviews.text: This toy is adorable. It was one of the first toys we got for my newborn son and he got a kick out of it. It's easy for them to grab and helps with early dexterity, they enjoy rolling it around (and especially off the bed), and it's cute without being obnoxious. The lack of flashing lights and loud noises is pleasantly refreshing in an age where it seems every toy has to be electronic, and in some way dictate how it's played with instead of allowing natural observations and discovery.
customer_reviews.author: Bilbo Fredericks

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous plastic
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy while it lasted. In about a month and a half some sort of weird plastic wrapping started to peel off of it, which seems very dangerous for an infant.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard Antonyan

customer_reviews.title: #1 Choice as Baby's First Toy (3 Months+)
customer_reviews.text: Wow - The only toy that my 3 month old fell in love with instantly and has not tired of after a month of continuous playing. She can hold it easily and is stimulated by the colors and ball the rolls around inside. Any time she is a little fussy, this will calm her down (especially in the car). My #1 first choice as "baby's first toy". Absolutely love.
customer_reviews.author: SPROUT

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t roll!
customer_reviews.text: Can this toy really be called a ball if it doesn’t actually roll? It seems good enough quality and it rattles, but I bought it for my 12 month old and he has very little interest in playing with it because it doesn’t actually roll. He likes to play a game where we roll the ball back and forth, but can’t with this one and it makes him frustrated. Maybe if he were younger this would have been more fun for him. He prefers playing with a tennis ball than with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kate815

customer_reviews.title: Look-alike very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed I ordered the baby Einstein bendy ball I didn't get the baby Einstein bendy ball I got a look-alike not happy with my purchase there is a bell in it and it is quite annoying it looks very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and concerns about the screws yet I reluctantly purchased this toy for my then 4 months old daughter up one arrival the screws are very noticeable and there's a few of them not just 1 or 2. I didn't give this to my daughter to play with because the screws made me uneasy none of her other toys regardless of place of origin had screws or at least visible ones.
customer_reviews.author: Vane Celeste Molina

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved this ball. The ball is of super-bright colors which bring baby's attention easily. The ball is easy to hold. Good for teething. My baby so much loved this ball, while she started to learn to crawl she would try so much harder to reach it and it was so much fun watching her. It also taught her to enhance her motor skills because she use to use both hands it along with sitting up and rolling it around was good to keep her active. I am so glad I bought this little ball.
customer_reviews.author: Sourabh

customer_reviews.title: Deceivingly fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so the picture is deceiving. It is cute in the picture but really looks like a cat toy in person. I do have to say.... the baby ABSOLUTELY LOVES THIS TOY!!! Just saying that makes me laugh out loud.... Oh, not good for teething. Baby can’t get his mouth around any part of it to rub or bite down. But, just to see him chase it around because he loves the sound and the look of it is priceless!
customer_reviews.author: Doris Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: No worries...just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great, colourful and not too noisy. This toy rolls just far enough and keeps baby smiling. The ball in the centre can't fit through the spaces, so no worries there. The spaces are baby grip friendly and if baby swings it to the face, no harm done as the material is sturdy but not hard. Overall great buy to keep baby entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Grant

customer_reviews.title: Einstein Ball
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than I imagined. But, it's sturdy and very colorful. The screws that hold the ball together are on the inside of the ball so your baby can't reach them. It does exactly as advertised it: "shakes, rattles, and rolls". Very good for tactile, cognitive and hand-eye coordination. Christmas time is coming and this is a great first toy for your baby. Have fun playing with that little one! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Fast delivery, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 2 month old and was born with a birth injury. She was diagnosed with Erb’s Palsy, right brachial plexus injury, and a fractured Right Clavicle. I purchased this toy to help her with her right arm/shoulder and hand, grips and sensory. So far she likes it, smiles back at the smiley face on it and is able to grasp it with my help. The rattle is nice and loud and the colors are vibrant. It had no odor, is smooth, and light weight. Would definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: 💋

customer_reviews.title: Tongue gets stuck. Not for 3 month olds.
customer_reviews.text: I usually love all of baby Einstein toys but this is not for use for 3 a month old. I was so excited to give this to my granddaughter. She grabbed it right away when she seen how colorful it was. As she was playing With it and trying to bite it as 3 month olds will do her Tongue got stuck in it. I am absolutely stunned baby Einstein would market this ball for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Baby toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a filler item and was pleasantly surprised. While this in no way is for teething it is fantastic for little hands to grip and maneuver it. It's primary colors get a baby's attention immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Dandy Diz

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay ball rattle. It says it’s bendy, but in my opinion it doesn’t really bend much. Since it’s Baby Einstein, I thought the quality would be a little better, but for the price it’s okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: every baby is different
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 months old and while he will play with this it is not one of his favourites. I suppose every baby is different and do not think it is the fault of the toy. Minus one star because I am disappointed that having been named "bendy" it is not quite as bendy as you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeela

customer_reviews.title: Center ring it not soft!
customer_reviews.text: The toy comes with a center ring, which is a bit hard. When the child holds it, they can easily hit it on their head. Apart from the center ring, the toy is soft to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious

customer_reviews.title: Danger-It Broke Right Away
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I recall leaving a one star review. This may be my 1st. This item broke within 3 days of purchasing it. My 6 month old granddaughter barely used it. One of the plastic outer "rings" broke all the way through. The ball in the middle can come out. I threw it in the trash. It's not worth returning. It didn't cost a lot but I wouldn't want this if it was free!
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: Clunky and awkward
customer_reviews.text: This ball came very highly recommended, but I like it less than I like the oballs. It's much heavier, and it doesn't roll very easily because of the caterpillar. It's not as easy for my son to manipulate or to put his mouth on (which he loves to do). If you have an oball that has the rattles built in to it, I'd skip this toy.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Know what your kid likes....
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was the kind of kid who got her fingers stuck a few times trying to get at the inside ball. Ended up unscrewing it to give her the ball and tossed the outside cage
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Rattle Toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson LOVES this rattle. He’s about 6 months old now and he plays with it all the time. It’s very easy for his tiny fingers to hold & it’s not too hard so it’s great for him to bite on!
customer_reviews.author: MrsBrittonsCreations

customer_reviews.title: because our little one didnt like it much
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing really wrong with the product. But we had to return it, because our little one didnt like it much. Its hard to predict what babies like, my little girl didn't go for this one. There was also a little concern she might tangle her finger in it, but we never came to that as no matter how hard we tried, she did'nt prefer this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Vignesh Ravindran

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice toy. Easy for baby to grab/throw and shake. My only con is that its is held together with multiple screws and it makes me nervous for choking/safety hazards.
customer_reviews.author: Oosh23

customer_reviews.title: Easy for babies to hold
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 5 months old & this ball is easy for him to hold & he even throws it & my German Shepherd brings it back to him it’s so cute to watch! It’s just a fun toy for him
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grab and hold
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters favorite toy because it’s so easy to grab and hold! She loved it at my friends house so I ordered one for home. May have to get another!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Bennett

customer_reviews.title: It's cool I guess, but it's not really a ball.
customer_reviews.text: The "ball" is about the size of a softball. It has no moving parts other than the second smaller ball inside the larger one. You can't bounce it because it's made of hard plastic and hard rubber. It's not easy to roll because of the little worm-guy that surrounds the ball. The red and blue portions of the ball are flexible and can be bent inwards slightly. The main use for this toy would be for an infant to hold, look at, and shake. If you're looking for a ball that functions as a ball, look elsewhere. If you're looking for an updated version of a rattle, this may be for you.
customer_reviews.author: Doofenshmirtz

customer_reviews.title: Sizeing , measurements quality.  The toy was too too small maybe for anfant it would be great
customer_reviews.text: It was for a 1year old the ball is the size of my Palm. All the other orders are great! Thank you Amazon for your understanding i will continue to place orders Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: ITSOKAY72

customer_reviews.title: wonderful first toy and a great Amazon price
customer_reviews.text: Again, great product offered at Amazon at a great price. Colorful, cheerful "happy" toy Four year old sister took to it immediately showing little sister the new toy. Very pleased with the quality. Fast delivery well packaged. Amazon is my "go to" place for virtually all my shopping. I would also add that while I did not need it here, I did have a small issue with another purchase which was quickly addressed and resolved to my complete satisfaction, actually was astonished by the immediate response I got. As a business owner I rely on Amazon for a wide spectrum of products andI can honestly say that in my 3 year relationship with Amazon I have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: wordknitter

customer_reviews.title: Just like Bright Starts, different colors
customer_reviews.text: We have the similar Bright Starts ball and it is literally our baby's favorite toy, so for a change in colors I decided to get the Baby Einstein as well. I love it! Easy to hold, bendy (but yes, the caterpillar is hard, our baby has never had a problem with this) and screws are exposed. None of this has ever been/foreseen as an issue. Our kid absolutely adores this, and it's much better than some of the toys our 3 year old prefers. Lmao
customer_reviews.author: Elfy Ever After

customer_reviews.title: Infant likes it
customer_reviews.text: It’s again another good toy for the little one. He holds it now as he is 5 months. He seem to like it. Maybe next month he will start actually rolling it. Will update then further
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: and it help up wonderfully to a very playful
customer_reviews.text: This toy kept my son busy at 9 months old for many hours. He played with it quite a while, and it help up wonderfully to a very playful, enthusiastic dog (who can destroy his own toys within a few hours of getting them). Easy for little hands to grasp and light enough for him to throw for the dog to fetch, chew and return it, still in one piece. It's adorable and colorful, and very much catches a child's eye.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pudas

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for a little older kids who know how to ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter would grip on this and throw it around. Only thing was, she would hit herself with it and it is hard and it hurt her. Would recommend for a little older kids who know how to play with toys. Otherwise it is an awesome toy.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Really cute :)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 month old nephew for Christmas, along with a bunch of other small toys. And I loved it. It's not too big, and it's not too heavy, and it seemed to be constructed of sort of a softer plastic. It is great for little hands to grab onto and hold, and the little jingling ball inside only adds to the appeal of this particular toy. It was probably my favorite toy out of all the toys I bought him.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad product really, but my child never found it interesting. Just like someone else said in the reviews that the plastinc band in the middle of the ball is hard and my child did end up hitting herself in the head with it, which ok not a great thing to have happen but wasn't a big deal, she cried a bit and got over it. She just never really played with it or found it intertaining in any way, but every child is different. I can't say that it's bad in the way it was manufactured or the looks or anything. We're expecting a second child, maybe he'll like the toy better.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for Christmas when my daughter was about 4 months. She's now 10 months and has started crawling and honestly I think this toy being out of her reach is what motivates her to crawl. It has a bendy shell and a smaller ball inside that rattles. There are screws on it the but they are all secure and the backs are completely covered. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: clemsongirl

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR 3 month old nor 4 nor 5 month old baby
customer_reviews.text: I gave this toy to my 3 month old and he continuously hit himself in the face waving it around then he would cry. Again I tried at 4,5 months gave him the ball and he cried I finally figured out he got his little fingers caught inbetween the small holes. My baby got his fingers stuck and hurt himself several times. He does like this ball but I recommend this for babies 6 months and up. FYI this ball does not bend for a baby more like adults to forcibly bend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Lovely

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dear Baby Einstein, Is there anything you make that don't make babies happy?? Get this! Your baby will be so proud he/she can pick it up and make noise. The toy is small and light enough to lift by himself and he can wrap his little fingers around the plastic pieces and shake it to make noise. My son loves to pick it up while rolling around. You can use this even before they can pick it up. The still like the colors and the noise it makes.
customer_reviews.author: Dearlady

customer_reviews.title: Good find!
customer_reviews.text: Fun little toy for my little babe. She likes to hold it and try to get it in her mouth (she's 3 mos). The colors and the sound keep her attention.
customer_reviews.author: lalazanderson

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves This
customer_reviews.text: My six month old loves this toy! Its easy for him to hold and he loves the noise it makes. Its a great simple toy for baby!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: This should be on every registry
customer_reviews.text: Seems really simple but it’s perfect for a baby and they LOVE it. I don’t know what it is that makes my baby pick this toy over his others but he loves it. The noise it makes is not annoying, in fact it’s pleasant so it’s nice to listen to and watch my baby play with it. This belongs on every registry.
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: Use your best judgement.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item for our 15 week old. It looks at first glance like a fun toy. It's easy to squeeze and makes a fun rattling sound. There is just one problem the way the toy is made the screws are exposed just inside the ball. This is only a minor issue as long as the heads of the screws are not sharp, and as long as the screws are in tightly. Since our little one chews everything I can't say that I am very comfortable with allowing him to play with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: kevin riley

customer_reviews.title: Adorable ball, perfect for little hands
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son before he was born, and when he was a couple months old we would hold it in front of him and gently shake it. There is a cute little rattle ball inside. He would reach up to grab the soft sides of the ball and squeeze. As he got older and he was doing tummy time, we would roll the ball to him. He loved to watch it go across the floor. It may seem on the small side for an adult, but if it was larger I don't think it would appeal as much to babies. I have given this ball to two friends for baby shower gifts. Instant hits!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby  raccoons
customer_reviews.text: I can't say how these would work for toddlers, I bought this for a wildlife rehabilitator that has a bunch of baby raccoons. They love these!
customer_reviews.author: SarahQ

customer_reviews.title: Must have toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this ball still at 12 months. I got it for him when he was 6 months. Its super easy for baby to hold and shake.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: My 15 week old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who is 3 and a half months old. She loves it! I rattle it and she opens out her hands to get me to give it to her, grasps it with both hands, and tries to put it straight in her mouth. Its so cute. She likes the colors and the ball inside. The blue and red mesh are soft rubber (For when they bonk themselves in the head with it). But, the caterpillar that wraps around it is hard plastic (Ouch). But I haven't seen her hurt herself with it so I'm sure it's fine. Overall great product for this age.
customer_reviews.author: Gongju

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my newest nephew because it reminded me of a soft orange ball my son loved as a baby. This is quite small. Good for tiny hands I guess, but the one my son had was about 40% bigger and because it was so flexible, it was still great for a baby, in fact, his favorite toy. This one is fairly hard plastic, only slightly flexible. The plastic does not bend, but the ball flexes slightly because of the design. Seems hard for a baby. I hope he likes it - if I had seen it in person, I probably would have opted for something else.
customer_reviews.author: myshopper

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. Perfect condition. My niece loves it. Not sure about cleaning since I don't have to so I rated as neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Tescalante

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toy
customer_reviews.text: Simple toy , is not my baby favorite , but she get some good time with this one also
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Orlando Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved it. Sturdy and can withstand abuse. Great buy for your toddler. Keeps them busy!
customer_reviews.author: Maria J

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball for a Growing Baby!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a while ago for my baby daughter, and at first she didn't seem all the interested in it. I was a bit disappointed as I thought this was a great toy. However, now that she has grown a bit, she absolutely loves this ball! She is 7 months old, and loves grabbing it and shaking it around. With the spoke-like design, it is very easy for her to grab and hold onto. I am trying to teach her how to roll it back and forth, but it might be a while before she understands that :-).
customer_reviews.author: J. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Don't hate..but don't love it.
customer_reviews.text: This was the first ball I gave my baby girl. I'm not crazy about it. She likes to grab it and shake it (the smaller ball inside makes a rattle type sound), but that's what a rattle is for. It does not roll well. I gave it three stars because I guess it's meant to roll just a few paces away so that the baby has incentive to craw towards it, but my daughter had a hard time rolling it. Now that she is nine months, she just throws it. I'm grateful it's made out of plastic for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Saba

customer_reviews.title: Small toy
customer_reviews.text: This was much smaller than I expected but its a really nice toy
customer_reviews.author: debluvsdoug

customer_reviews.title: Good 1st toys
customer_reviews.text: 4 month old is learning to play with it more amd more each day and he seems to enjoy it. Easy for babies to learn how to grab onto and shake the ball around
customer_reviews.author: Maebehippie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy! Buy if you dare!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy! I bought it for him when he first started teething at around 4 months (now 8 months). The colors are very bright and when he learned how to grab/grasp, the big holes made it hard for him to miss picking it up. The rattling that the toy makes when it is shook is not too loud but just enough to make my son chuckle. Also, it is very easy to clean. The colors are still as bright as ever! Heavy duty toy for my rough playing boy!
customer_reviews.author: TeeCP

customer_reviews.title: LEAST USED of all his toys
customer_reviews.text: I don't get this toy.... I only bought it because it had high reviews. But it is not very bendy, and it is hard, and edges are aggressive. I don't feel comfortable with my baby playing with it. It looks like from others comments, the manufacture may have changed how they make it. I think I may just throw this in the garbage since it was only $6 I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: L. Penner

customer_reviews.title: Bender (?) Ball
customer_reviews.text: It said "BENDER BALL" as if the ball actually DOES something. I was very disappointed when I first saw it. HOWEVER. My grandson (just turned 1 in December)was thrilled to receive this particular Christmas present. I'm glad Amazon didn't ask me for a review right after I first received this object - I would have given it a ZERO. BENDER BALL? Implies that it's capable of bending. Perhaps it does? There are no instructions (other than cleaning instructions in 3 different languages...) Whatever. The grandson loved it and that's why it got 4 stars from me. (I will add, that the price Amazon posted was more reasonable than baby toys in department stores, and the shipping was faster than Santa!)
customer_reviews.author: S. Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Held together with tiny metal screws
customer_reviews.text: This item is a really odd design for a baby. It’s held together with a series of tiny metal screws. I ended up returning, it just doesn’t seem super safe with small parts like this.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and niece-in-law's little girl, who will be 1 year old next month. Since I live too far away to actually see her, I get reports from "mommy & daddy" as to what goes over good or what's a flop, and if I get lucky, I even get some action shots. According to "mommy & daddy" my great-niece loves this toy. Therefore, she would definitely recommend it to her buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Most Perfect baby gift
customer_reviews.text: Our newest grandson is now 14 wks old and he already loves this ball. It is bright and his little fist grips it and it is light enuf for him to move and that makes the little inside ball roll around.. . He gets very excited to such and chew on this even at that young age. His 2 year old sister also likes to play with it because she can catch and throw it easily because of the open web design. Best ball ever!
customer_reviews.author: Gail M. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for 4 month old!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my 4 month old nephew. He can grab it easily because it’s made perfect for his little hands. This is his favorite toy. Would recommend to others because it helps build motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I love it, it’s super cute! I’m just hoping I get use out of it lol. My daughter would love it if she could get it in her mouth but she can’t figure it out yet
customer_reviews.author: Abi Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: At almost 2 years old our grandson still enjoys Tulsa this ball around.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: A great first toy for an infant even at 2-3 months
customer_reviews.text: A great first toy for an infant even at 2-3 months. The ball is light and doesn't take much motor control for an infant to create movement and sound all on their own. Kids of all ages like balls and this is a good one. The primary colors and smily face on the ball also add visual stimulation to catch the infant's eye for fun. The ball can be hung from a hanging gym with infant plastic links.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and loved it. The holes in the ball allowed my daughter to grasp it, even with her small hands and fingers. And the ball inside and the caterpillar face would get her attention. Note that it won't roll in a straight line because of the caterpillar on the outside, but she wasn't ready for playing ball yet anyway, so it didn't really matter for her.
customer_reviews.author: J Kitchin

customer_reviews.title: LED lights
customer_reviews.text: Oh my such cute little rings When I ordered them I had no idea they were going to be so cute My granddaughters love them They wear one on every finger they can get them on They love walking around flashing them at night These were so inexpensive I didn't think they'd be all that they are Aweaome for children from 6 and up. forget that s review its for the wrong item I have not recieved this ball yet It's taking forever to get it
customer_reviews.author: Rose Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: My baby's favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: We love this ball! It is my baby's favorite toy. She is in that stage where every toy gets chewed on and sometimes depending on what toy she's playing with, she gags herself and spit up is everywhere. The great thing about this toy is that she gets the satisfaction of chewing on something but she can't fit this in her mouth, so she will keep herself occupied and has lots of fun shaking and chewing on the links.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Dillon

customer_reviews.title: This instantly became the baby's favorite toy.
customer_reviews.text: The Baby Einstein Bendy Ball was an impulse purchase while searching for another item. My granddaughter, then five months old, instantly latched on to it as her favorite toy. She still loves it a month later. She is very intent on passing it around in her tiny fingers, learning a lot of fine motor skills. Of course, one of her main goals is to get it into her mouth, which has taught more skills. The colors, the flexibility, the interesting noises it makes when it moves all keep her interest. I highly recommend this inexpensive toy for infants.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Stokesberry

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy
customer_reviews.text: This is for my new little grandbaby so I can't say how much she likes it yet. I can say I like the many varied textures and colors. It is the right size for little hands and light weight. I feel good about this well made toy and the safety factor of no parts that can come off to be swallowed.
customer_reviews.author: RUBYDALLAS

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this toy since she was about 5 months old when I introduced it to her. It's the toy that goes everywhere with her now. I like that she can put her hands through and hold firmly and even pass from one hand to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the design of this ball
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the design of this ball. While the rubber on the two sides was nice and soft, the entire plastic band running around the ball was a very hard plastic. Not only was I concerned about how hard it was, it also seemed like it would prevent the ball from rolling very well. I returned this and purchased the Munchkin bath ball instead. Even though that product is labeled as a bath product, it is a great ball to use outside of the tub, too!
customer_reviews.author: APaulsonTop Contributor: Children's Books

customer_reviews.title: Lots of interest and fun for the very little ones
customer_reviews.text: Not so much that I liked it, but more importantly the grandbaby likes it. She took to it immediately. She put it in her mouth, she rolls it around, she investigates all the openings, so much to enjoy apparently. Makes me wonder what she is thinking as it keeps her attention.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: The rattling really makes her curious and also makes it easy to pass back and forth and shake
customer_reviews.text: My daughter can play a while with this ball. The rattling really makes her curious and also makes it easy to pass back and forth and shake. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: kristina

customer_reviews.title: great in the bath
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old daughter loves this above all other toys in the bath. She can grasp it, but beyond that, the little ball inside floats and makes it really interesting for her to play around with. She gets that cliched wide-open-mouth look of intrigue as she bats it around. Of course this is a very popular toy, so what's another review for it? just wanted to say that it's an amazing bath toy - so even if you have lots of toys already, how's your bath toy stash? This is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bendy Ball
customer_reviews.text: We got this because my nephew has a bendy ball, I'm not sure which brand, that my daughter loves. This ball isn't as bendy or lightweight as my nephew's, but it does have a littler ball that rattles inside it, which is a nice feature. It's also pretty easy to wash. We've been using it in the kitchen and on the changing table, because I know I can get it clean if it meets with something unsavory. Overall we're pleased, but I'd buy a bendier, lighter weight ball if I were to purchase a bendy ball again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Not what's pictured
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I saw a few reviews where people got a toy that was different than the one in the picture and this happened to me. That being said the packaging looks like legit baby einstein merchandise and says bpa free so maybe it's just a newer version? I'll be keeping the toy and update this review if anything goes awry but just be aware you are NOT getting the toy in the picture
customer_reviews.author: MICHTAK

customer_reviews.title: For my nephews for Christmas. They both loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and perfect size for small hands. I bought two of these For my nephews for Christmas. They both loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop

customer_reviews.title: Not very bendy, has finger traps!
customer_reviews.text: Not very bendy! It is pretty hard rubber that takes a bit of force to bend. Also the caterpillar is very hard plastic. It would hurt if hit on the head with with it. Another problem is that the caterpillar creates finger traps in which a three month old could get a finger caught in. I bought this for a nephew that will be three months soon, but do not trust it to not to hurt him. I do not understand all the positive raving reviews. Just trying to be honest. Keep in mind it is four inches across at its widest point. No sure why things always look bigger in the advertisements.
customer_reviews.author: eljay

customer_reviews.title: This is by far one of the best gifts I received
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best gifts I received. The bright colors are attractive, and the ball is light and best it is easy for the little fingers to hold and play with. My daughter played with this from when she was about 2-3 months old to till she started crawling. It was her favorite toy
customer_reviews.author: viswamurthi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My kid has been interested in this since he could grab toys. He loves it. I think it’s fun for him to try to squish t and chew on it.

customer_reviews.title: My 5 month nephew’s favorite
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this and he has a ton of toys. This is the one he reaches for. He likes to sleep with it. I’m not sure why but he loves it. It’s nothing special but it keeps him happy. It’s the first toy he had ever grabbed and held onto.
customer_reviews.author: Ranita P

customer_reviews.title: Babies love it!
customer_reviews.text: This little toy is entertaining. It jingles and babies love staring at the little ball inside. My friend was visiting with her baby and saw my baby’s bendy ball and had to have it. So yes, I have to buy another one bc her baby was having too much fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective toy
customer_reviews.text: Basically, this is a bendy ball with a rattle inside. The beauty of this toy is that, while lightweight, it is still durable, it's easy for a baby to hold onto due to innumerable places to grip the ball, and it holds a baby's attention due to the various sounds the inner rattle ball makes when they shake the thing. My daughter usually keeps this close by, as opposed to most of her other toys which get flung aside, sometimes a surprising distance away. She really loves this ball, and i am glad to have purchased iot accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Faden

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: So easy to grip, hold, and shake for my 4 month old granddaughter
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The ball we received had a very strong smell of chemicals. I hand washed it with soap and left it out for 2 weeks and it continues to ‘off gas.’
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old daughter loves it! She's able to hold it...shake it...and when she drops it and it rolls away she laughs! We are excited for her to chase after it when she starts crawling! We take it everywhere with us to keep her busy and happy! Great toy! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie C

customer_reviews.title: He Likes It!
customer_reviews.text: The title is misleading; this is really more of a hard plastic. It doesn't bend. However, it's designed in such a way that small fingers can hold it when the baby is just beginning to reach for things. My 5 month old grandson likes it, and that's good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleBookMamaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Baby immediately took to this toy. Great toy for the collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 5 month old baby boy and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Allie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Just a nice toy easy to hold and rattles well Baby loves it
customer_reviews.author: przemek

customer_reviews.title: An instant hit with a rather picky infant
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old daughter really likes this ball, and she can be really picky when it comes to toys. It's really easy for her to grab and hold or roll which she really enjoys. She is teething at the moment, so she tends to bring everything to her mouth. While she does try to put this in her mouth, she gets more satisfaction out of some of her other teether toys. This is just a fun, inexpensive ball/rattle. I'm sure she will get a lot of enjoyment out of this for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this awhile ago but just recently gave the toy to my daughter & it is her absolute favorite toy. Shes 3 1/2 months & can pick it up just fine and occasionally throws it. But it entertains her more than any of her toys I have bought her. Whenever we go anywhere I make sure I pack it.
customer_reviews.author: Correna

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!! The toy is not safe for ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy!! The toy is not safe for little hands and fingers. Didn't have factory packaging - have no idea who made it and what it made of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great build and durability
customer_reviews.text: Have your kid throw it, shake it, and be rest assured that it won't break and no small pieces will ever come. It is made of great quality material, very solid build and design, making it stand all the toughness that your child will through into his toys.
customer_reviews.author: Isam

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous toy!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this a negative star, that would be more appropriate. There is a metal bell inside the top with a tiny bead inside. The bell has sharp sides and a child's tongue would get caught inside the bell. On the label it says the toy is recommended for kids over 3 YEARS. That is not how it was advertised. I pried out the bell and gave it to the dog. Do NOT buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: Surprise! My baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, as in the case of most reviewers, my baby daughter just loves this ball. And I like rolling it towards her and watch her grab it. Of course, the next thing she does is try to chew on it. :) I am very content with the purchase because I bought it after a lot of research on balls for babies and the one that I finally settled for seems to be a hit with my daughter. Amazon delivered it within two days of my ordering it. So all the more reason for the 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: T B.

customer_reviews.title: Simple but kept the baby busy
customer_reviews.text: Not much to this toy but it kept my son occupied. Little things like this are great, can never have too many.
customer_reviews.author: Seth W

customer_reviews.title: I feel like he is saying to himself "
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old plays fetch with me. I feel like he is saying to himself " watch this guy go get whatever I throw across the room". I bought it for him to learn to grasp with a purpose. I had no idea I was training an NFL Quarterback or MLB Pitcher, or just a Class Clown messing with his teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 2 month daughter
customer_reviews.text: Our two month baby likes this toy. She's learning to try and grasp and this easily lets her latch on. The rattle in the ball gets her attention well and moving it around slowly near her face lets her focus and track it as it's moved. There are screws visible while you hold it but they haven't been a problem at all and don't appear to be loose enough to fall out or cause any issues.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviewerFromUSA

customer_reviews.title: great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson when he was about 7 months and he loves it. Don't worry about bad reviews. He has never gotten his fingers stuck in the slots and seriously i think you'd have to try hard to even do that. He loves it because it's the one inside toy he is allowed to throw : ) The main parts are all soft and can't hurt anything. My Grandson is now a year old and loves to throw it and chase it. It's from Baby Einstein~ what more do we need to know?
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Maydole

customer_reviews.title: I feel it is a great ball and very easy for little hands to handle
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 months old granddaughter and she loves it, I read complaints out how the screws are somewhat exposed but, we never leave the baby unattended with any toy, not a problem. I feel it is a great ball and very easy for little hands to handle.
customer_reviews.author: oalech

product_meta.title: Baby Einstein Bendy Ball Rattle Toy, Ages 3 months +
product_meta.description:
With the Baby Einstein Bendy Ball, your little one will light up with excitement with every bend and squeeze. Babies love to grip our soft flexible plastic and smile back at our cheerful caterpillar during playtime. With a ball inside the bendy ball, this developmental toy is fun to shake, rattle and roll. The sensory ball helps with handling skills, and little fingers can explore all the colorful textures and shapes. Because of its small size, this activity ball is perfect for travel entertainment and brings a sense of wonder and awe wherever you are.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Baby Einstein Bendy Ball features bright primary colors and the recognizable Caterpillar character on center band. Soft, flexible plastic make this ball both durable and fun and the Bendy Ball's design makes it easy for little fingers to grasp and roll. The multi-colored rolling Rattle Ball inside adds additional sounds and visual stimulation to this toy.
feature_bullets: This captivating ball will become your baby’s main squeeze
Bendable, grippable plastic is BPA free
Baby loves to shake the little ball inside
Ideal size for your travel or diaper bag

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,837 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
